name: Nag Champa 10 oz. Candle and Mixtape Pairing
description:
Inspired by the popular incense, this fragrance is a relaxing blend of patchouli and gurjun balsam essential oils with touches of powder, musk, amber, and vanilla. If you've never smelled it before, you have to try it. If you know it,  then you'll love this rendition.

Each of the 10 oz. candles in the Wax Candle Co. Higher Ground Collection are made from all-natural American grown soy wax, clean burning cotton wicks and aromatic fragrance oils. The eco-friendly glass tumbler can also be reused/repurposed as a pencil holder or desktop accessory.  

Each candle comes paired with Wax Mixtape 001: Higher Ground, curated by DJ Simone "Jazz It Up" Vimercati. This mix is an exploration of what Vimercati dubs "space jazz", a varied soundscape of astral, soul and acid jazz. It features artists both new and familiar and is sure to be popular with both novice jazz listeners and connoisseurs alike. You will receive the password to access and download the mixtape when you receive your candle. 

Wax Mixtape 001: Higher Ground is the perfect soundtrack for relaxation, meditation, a chill session with friends, or a night alone with your boo. When paired with the Wax Nag Champa Candle it truly creates a unique aromatherapy listening experience.

All Wax Candles are hand-poured with love in Washington, DC.

name: French Citrus 10 oz. Candle and Mixtape Pairing
description:

description:
This fragrance is a refreshing blend of rosemary and peppermint oil. Peppermint energizes the body, awakens the senses and creates a peaceful welcoming environment in your home.

name: Lavender 6 oz. Candle and Mixtape Pairing
description:
This candle has the soft, relaxing scent of lavender.

Each of the candles in the Wax Candle Co. Higher Ground Collection are made from all-natural American grown soy wax, clean burning cotton wicks and aromatic fragrance oils.

Each candle comes paired with Wax Mixtape 001: Higher Ground, curated by DJ Simone "Jazz It Up" Vimercati. This mix is an exploration of what Vimercati dubs "space jazz", a varied soundscape of astral, soul and acid jazz. It features artists both new and familiar and is sure to be popular with both novice jazz listeners and connoisseurs alike. You will receive the password to access and download the mixtape when you receive your candle. 

Wax Mixtape 001: Higher Ground is the perfect soundtrack for relaxation, meditation, a chill session with friends, or a night alone with your boo. When paired with the Wax Lavender Candle it truly creates a unique aromatherapy listening experience.

All Wax Candles are hand-poured with love in Washington, DC.

Note: 100% soy wax undergoes a natural crystallization process as it ages. This is commonly referred to as "frosting". It sometimes creates white spots or a white layer on the top of the candle. This is natural and it does not affect the fragrance throw or burn of the candle.

name: Unscented 6 oz. Candle and Mixtape Pairing
description:
The unscented candle is the perfect choice for anyone who wants the light and calm that comes with candles, but doesn't want the scent to distract from a fragrant dinner.

Each of the candles in the Wax Candle Co. Higher Ground Collection are made from all-natural American grown soy wax and clean burning cotton wicks.

Each candle comes paired with Wax Mixtape 001: Higher Ground, curated by DJ Simone "Jazz It Up" Vimercati. This mix is an exploration of what Vimercati dubs "space jazz", a varied soundscape of astral, soul and acid jazz. It features artists both new and familiar and is sure to be popular with both novice jazz listeners and connoisseurs alike. Wax Mixtape 001: Higher Ground is the perfect soundtrack for relaxation, meditation, a chill session with friends, or a night alone with your boo. 

All Wax Candles are hand-poured with love in Washington, DC.

Note: 100% soy wax undergoes a natural crystallization process as it ages. This is commonly referred to as "frosting". It sometimes creates white spots or a white layer on the top of the candle. This is natural and it does not affect the fragrance throw or burn of the candle.

name: Gift Box and Bow
description: Giving your candle as a gift? Snazz it up a bit and package it in a black gift box filled with black raffia and topped with a white raffia bow! It will arrrive ready for gift-giving.

name: Tealight Set (6) and Mixtape Pairing
description:
This set includes six (6) half oz. tealights. You can select one of five scent options: French citrus, rosemary mint, lavender, nag champa and unscented.

Each of the tealights in the Wax Candle Co. Higher Ground Collection are made from all-natural American grown soy wax, clean burning cotton wicks and aromatic fragrance oils.

Each tealight set comes paired with Wax Mixtape 001: Higher Ground, curated by DJ Simone "Jazz It Up" Vimercati.
